content:

inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "emerald", "quantity": 63, "index": 12}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 9, "index": 19}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 60, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 33}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 33, "index": 34}, {"type": "gray_concrete", "quantity": 6, "index": 35}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 40, "index": 36}, {"type": "orange_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 41}, {"type": "rotten_flesh", "quantity": 9, "index": 42}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 42, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a wooden_axe, I need to place 2 sticks and 3 wooden_planks in the crafting table. There are 1 wooden_planks in slot 39, so I will move it to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
